entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 11:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
